author: Sephiko

text: This game had some really great ambient themes for the SNES, the Follin brothers really were ahead of their time with their compositions (see games like Plok). This track is one of the more melodic ones and I chose the short version since the long version has about 4-5 minutes of random ambient noises that don't work too well out of context.
author: SupraDarky
